board_get.description: Get full card details by ID.

blame_file.description: Get git blame for a file - shows who wrote each line and when.

branch_diff.description: Get summary of changes between branches - files changed, additions/deletions, commits ahead/behind.

changed_symbols.description: Get symbols (functions, classes, methods) that changed between git refs.

commit_info.description: Get details of a specific commit - message, author, files changed.

diff_file.description: Get diff of a file between two commits.

file_history.description: Get commits that touched a file - understand how code evolved.

git_commit.description: Create a commit with staged changes.

git_status.description: Get current git status - branch, staged/unstaged changes, untracked files.

recent_changes.description: Get recently changed files across the repository.

search_commits.description: Search commits by message content - find when a feature or fix was added

insight.description: Get comprehensive understanding of a file, directory, or symbol.

suggest_refactoring.description: Analyze code and suggest refactoring opportunities.

preview_edit.description: Preview the consequences of an edit BEFORE making it.

get_project_info.description: Get basic project information - name, type, version, available scripts.

get_quickstart.description: Get actionable commands to install, build, test, and run this project.

get_scripts.description: Get available scripts/commands that can be run in this project

get_session_guide.description: MANDATORY: Call this at the start of every session and after context compacting.

get_structure.description: Get an overview of the project

get_tech_stack.description: Detect frameworks, libraries, and tools used in this project.

analyze_deps.description: Analyze project dependencies and detect circular imports.

apply_edits.description: Apply multiple edits across files atomically.

batch_edit_symbols.description: Edit multiple symbols across files atomically.

edit_lines.description: Replace a range of lines by line number.

extract_function.description: Extract a range of lines into a new function.

find_dead_code.description: Find functions/methods that are never called from any exported entry point.

find_paths.description: Find all paths between two symbols in the call graph.

find_references.description: Find all usages and references of a symbol throughout the codebase.

find_unused_exports.description: Find exports that are not imported anywhere in the codebase.

get_callees.description: Find all functions/methods called by a given symbol.

get_callers.description: Find all functions/methods that call a given symbol.

get_exports.description: Get all export statements from a source file.

get_imports.description: Get all import statements from a source file.

inline_function.description: Replace a function call with the function body.

move_file.description: Move a source file to a new location and update all imports across the codebase.

move_symbol.description: Move a symbol (function, class, interface, etc.

organize_imports.description: Sort and organize import statements in file(s).

remove_unused_imports.description: Find and remove import statements that aren

rename_symbol.description: Rename a symbol (variable, function, class, etc.

search_symbols.description: Search for symbols by name pattern across all indexed files.

trace.description: Trace call chains forward (what does this call?

task_list.description: List all tasks, showing status and duration.

task_run.description: Run a command and wait for it to complete (or timeout).

task_start.description: Start a command in the background and return immediately.

find_tests_for.description: Find test files related to a source file.

get_test_failures.description: Get detailed information about failed tests from the last run.

list_test_files.description: List all test files in the project.

rerun_failed.description: Rerun only the tests that failed in the last run.

run_related_tests.description: Run tests related to a source file.

run_tests.description: Run tests in the project and get structured results.

check_file.description: Check a single TypeScript file for type errors.

get_quick_fixes.description: Get available fixes for type errors at a position.

get_type.description: Get type information at a specific position in a TypeScript file.

go_to_definition.description: Find where a symbol is defined.
